Title: Niger bans under-18s from picking scraps, ‘condemned iron’
Summary: Niger State government says anybody less than 18 years old is prohibited from picking scraps in the state . Governor Bago warned that anyone found with an item belonging to the public or private sector will be dealt with decisively .

Title: Ogun to begin statewide road maintenance
Summary: The Ogun State Government has announced the commencement of a comprehensive road maintenance programme across all local government areas . The Special Adviser to the Governor on Public Works, Engr. Babatunde Adesina, disclosed the initiative on Tuesday .

Title: Tinubu has power to fire only one governor – ADC spokesperson
Summary: President Bola Tinubu has the power to fire only one governor, says Bolaji Abdullahi . Abdullahi said this following the reinstatement of Siminilayi Fubara as the Governor of Rivers State .

Title: FIFA opens disciplinary case against SAFA, Mokoena
Summary: FIFA has officially opened disciplinary proceedings against the South African Football Association (SAFA) and Bafana Bafano midfielder Teboho Mokoena . FIFA opens disciplinary case against SAFA, Mokenkoa . The case is being investigated by FIFA's governing body FIFA .

Title: Why Jonathan is no threat to Tinubu’s re-election in 2027
Summary: Umar Yakasai, Director General of the Tinubu Support Group, has downplayed concerns that former President Goodluck Jonathan’s potential return to the presidential race could disrupt the ruling All Progressives Congress (APC) In an interview with ARISE NEWS on Thursday, Yaksai said Jonathan is no threat to Tin

Title: Insecurity: Again, NEC shuns deliberation on state police
Summary: The National Economic Council, NEC, declined to deliberate on the pending issue of State Police to curb insecurity across the country . Again, the NEC, again, shuns deliberation on state police .

Title: COVID-19 not totally eradicated – Prof of Medicine urges Nigerians to be watchful
Summary: Prof of Medicine urges Nigerians to be watchful, saying COVID-19 virus had not been totally eradicated . Solomon Kadiri, a Professor of Medicine, University of Ibadan, said the virus was not completely eradicated in Nigeria .

Title: Africa’s first underground tunnel project to begin in Lagos soon – SGOF
Summary: Federal Government's ambitious project to construct Africa’s first underground tunnel is set to commence in Lagos State . When completed, the tunnel will connect Victoria Island to Badagry .

Title: Penalty for sexual harassment in Ondo Civil Service is dismissal – HoS
Summary: Head of Service in Ondo State, Bayo Philip, says the new rules guiding the public service in the state have dismissal and criminal prosecution . Philip stated this on Thursday in Akure during the Annual General Meeting of the Association of Retired Heads .

Title: 2027: AA, PNT form alliance for Tinubu’s re-election in Ondo
Summary: Action Alliance (AA) and Progressive Network for Tinubu (PNT) have entered into an alliance in Ondo State . AA and PNT are mobilising support for the re-election of President Bola Taku . AA, PNT form alliance for 2027 general election .
